summary: A middle-aged mental patient suffering from a split personality travels to Italy where his two personalities set off all kinds of confusing developments.
cast: Martti Suosalo|Liisa Mustonen|Seela Sella|Risto Salmi|Mats Långbacka|Siiri Suosalo|Mika Räinä|Laura Jurkka|Jemina Sillanpää|Jerry Wahlforss|Ali Ahmeti|Zsuzsanna Rosendahl|Eeva Hakulinen|Emilio Rigagnoli|Marek Urbanski|Miia Räikkönen|Seija Seppä|Ivitali Imereli|Drita Lulicia|Bilal Akinci|Laura Benardi|Paride Contarini|Roberto Lazzeri|Federica Amantini|Mauro Benedetti|Thomas Cicognani|Stefano Soldati
title: Kalteva torni
